p: RPMI and Macoy's 5A media were purchased from Gibco. Fetal bovine serum (FBS) was purchased from Thermo Scientific. Streptomycin and penicillin were purchased from Welgene Inc. Sodium carbonate, Folin–Ciocalteu's reagent, gallic acid, diethylene glycol, sodium hydroxide, quercetin, (+)‐catechin, dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), N‐acetylcysteine (NAC), 3‐[4,5‐dimethylthiazol‐2‐yl]‐2,5‐diphenyl tetrazolium bromide (MTT), RNase, propidium iodide (PI), 2′,7′‐dichlorofluorescein diacetate (DCFH‐DA), 3,3′‐dihexyloxacarbocyanine iodide (DiOC 6), Matrigel, crystal violet, sodium dodecyl sulfate, and gelatin were purchased from Sigma‐Aldrich (St. Louis). Multi‐well plates were purchased from Corning Inc. All other chemicals and solvents (LC grade) were purchased from Fisher Scientifics.
